text: Sore wa shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu shimo be ni taishi, arrā ga tsutaeru kippōdearu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa sorenitaishite, nani no hōshū mo anata gata ni motomete wa inai. Watashi wa anata gata no kinshin to shite no jōai dake o motomeru. Sorede dare demo, zenkō o nasu mono ni wa, sore ni taishi sarani yoimono ga atae rareru. Hontōni arrā wa, kan'yō ni shite yoku kansha sa reru katadearu
